name: balanceAPI
description: Get real-time token balances and allowances from 1inch Balance API. This function provides accurate information about token balances and allowances across multiple chains. ALWAYS provide both 'endpoint' and 'chain' parameters - they are mandatory.

endpoint.description: REQUIRED: The balance API endpoint to call

examples.description: Get all token balances for a wallet address
Get balances for specific tokens for a wallet address
Get balances and allowances by spender for a wallet address
Get token allowances by spender for a wallet address
Get aggregated balances and allowances for multiple wallets
Get balances for specific tokens across multiple wallets

chain.description: REQUIRED: Chain ID for the blockchain network

walletAddress.description: Wallet address to get balances/allowances for (required for most endpoints, can be auto-filled from connected wallet)

spender.description: Spender address for allowance-related endpoints (e.g., 1inch router address)

wallets.description: Array of wallet addresses (required for aggregatedBalancesAndAllowances and getMultipleWalletsTokenBalances endpoints)

tokens.description: Array of token contract addresses (required for custom token endpoints)

filterEmpty.description: Filter out empty balances and allowances (optional, for aggregatedBalancesAndAllowances endpoint)
